Package alexwilton.handwritingAssistant

DEAL Handwriting Assistant.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MyScriptConnection.MessageHandler
    Interface requiring Message Handlers to implement handleMessage().
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Canvas
    Canvas records strokes from learner and sends them to the Stroke Analyser.
    DEALAssistant
    DEAL Assistant aids learners in their handwriting by providing a series of exercises.
    ExerciseManager
    Exercise Manager maintains information about every Exercise and is used to select current exercise.
    MyScriptConnection
    Class Manages connection to MyScript Cloud's stroke recognition service.
    StrokeAnalyser
    Stroke Analyser takes strokes from the canvas, divides them into stroke words (potential words) and analyses each stroke group separately.
    Word
    A Word object comprises of the area occupied by its strokes and the recognised text from MyScript for the strokes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MyScriptConnection.ConnectionStatus
    Allowed Statuses of Connection to MyScript Cloud Recognition.

Package alexwilton.handwritingAssistant Description

DEAL Handwriting Assistant. Uses a Java GUI to present a set of exercises, records learner's strokes, analyses strokes using MyScript and gives the learner visual feedback.
